reviewText: If you are working through Bill Mounce's textbook, you need these videos.  They are very well done and he gives a great explanation for each lesson and subject.  Really down to earth.

These lessons are excellent in learning the basics of Biblical Greek.  I have often been helped in Bible study by putting the lessons to use with the Geek text.  Dr. Mounce makes learning a challenging subject interesting and enjoyable.  He has a relaxed but enthusiastic style of presenting the material on these DVDs.

This is one of the best ways to learn Biblical Greek & I am so grateful & blessed to learn Greek through Mr. Mounce there is lot of material available like BBG & BBW too Thank you Sir & God bless you..
